评论详情: This shirt is long, and lightweight, covers the tush. The only thing I don't like is that it's a bit clingy on the bulges. I'm keeping it because I love the length and the pockets. Looks best with leggings.

I ordered the blue color & it’s nice. The shirt is basically a long sleeve tshirt - just slightly thicker, but still quite soft. I like the length as it covers my butt & hips. The pockets are a cute detail but they’re not functional.

I ordered 3 of these Long Sleeve Tops and I'm only 4' 10" and the tops 'ARE SO LONG'  I'm wearing them around the house, etc.  I do like the feel of the tops.....I should have just ordered 1 - to try one First.
Love this warm cozy sweater just hate having to hang dry.

评论概述: Love it!  my arms are too short so the sleeves are long but I like shirt to cover my but!!!
评论详情: Very comfortable I do roll up the ends of the sleeves.  I really love it.
Did not like anything about this top!

Lightweight but gives the arms coverage and warmth for chilly days! I sized up because I like oversized comfy tops but could have easily sized down. Washes and dries well (I partially dry in dryer and then hang to dry the rest of the way). Getting more in other colors.

NOT A SWEARTSHIRT! It's a nice thick tee-shirt material. Hangs nice. Long to cover the behind. Neck area is pretty large so I personally like to put on a light shirt underneath, so my bra straps don't peek out from one side to the other. Comfortable to wear. I usually wear a 22 and purchased a 3X. I like a more baggy fit than tight. Never know what you're going to get so I err on the side of larger.

Love this. It is so comfy whether you need something to take out the chill while sitting outside on a late summer night by the camp fire, or it's a chilly fall rainy day and you want to just curl up in something soft to read a book. If you are prone to hot flashes, it is a perfect shirt as it is loose fitting and breathable fabric when the internal inferno sparks.
Very big and material is just plain Tshirt material.
Soft and warm not too bulky and not too thin. It falls nicely not clingy or tight. Pockets are great and length covers what i need it to. I ordered a second one in burgundy!

评论概述: Wish they made this as a sleeping shirt!
评论详情: I wish they sold this at a longer length so that it could be used as a sleeping gown! It’s soft. I have sensitive skin and this doesn’t make me itch. I also hate things that are tight around my neck. This gives you room and you don’t feel like you are choking. Sized right with nice length in the sleeves. Overall it feels nice and gives you some warmth. Upon getting this one I promptly ordered another color that was on sale. I ordered a plus size. It’s loose a little like they stated. I would love to buy a sleeping gown like this as I said. I will try out other things that it offers since they were true to everything they said. Even if you are a plus size like me you will be happy with it!

3XL - I bought up a size to be sure this would be roomy, and it is. Very comfy and flowy enough over jeans (or leggings if that's your jam). As with most plus size tops, the larger you order the longer the sleeves get, because the manufacturing industry thinks the length of our arms is in direct correlation to the width of our hips? Anyway, I roll the sleeves up as I do with most of my tops, and it's great. Love the pockets - they're actually functional for small items - the length, and the color (green). Haven't washed or worn it too much yet so can't speak to longevity, but I'm eyeing the blush colored one next!

I ordered this because it is advertised as a lightweight sweatshirt. It is NOT a sweatshirt. It is a long sleeve t-shirt. It is a nice quality, long-sleeve t-shirt. It does seem to run a bit large. I haven’t washed it yet, so I don’t know if it shrinks up at all. I only gave it 3 stars because it’s not what was advertised. I needed a sweatshirt.
Ordered 2X and it’s really big.  I’m going to wash and dry it to see if it shrinks any.  Will be perfect for wearing over leggings.

I love this sweatshirt, it’s not too heavy or too light it’s just right ! I also like that they offer a variety of colors to choose from and the material is quality. I already own 3 and will be ordering more. Thanks !
The material is unbelievably soft.  Haven't washed it yet, but I love the way it fits and feels.
Love this shirt.  Fits loose and long.  Very good quality and looks just like pictures
Wore this on a day-long trip involving two flights. It was light-weight warmth and comfort. Fabric did snag a bit too easily.
I'm a 26/28 & I got the 5x (if you wear a 30/32 I'm sure you'll have plenty of room). I LOVE IT! It fits just right (I like my sweaters bigger). I'm getting more colors.
So cozy
Love the pockets!
Living in Texas when 90 degrees turns to 70, lol, it's time to bring out 'winter' gear. It's pretty and roomy and actually would make a great sleep shirt if you sleep 'warm.'  AND POCKETS!!!!

评论概述: Not made in US.  Poor quality
评论详情: Terrible sizing.  Not made in US

I love the fabric. It's thin but warm. The pockets make this sweater perfect. My only initial gripe would be the stitching on the arm but l quickly got over that and fully enjoyed the sweater. I recommend and I'm ordering other colors.
This shirt is comfy and cozy. Love the pockets

These tunics are LARGE. Depending on the style I usually wear a 4x . A 5x was recommended to get the roomy tunic look. After laundering and iputting it thru the dryer -which is not recommended (I don’t dry clothes with high temperatures) I still found it loose, the fabric incredibly soft and the colors still beautifully muted. It’s sort of a heathery color . The material is just a little bit heavier than a t-shirt and so soft. The length hits me just below the hip (I’m 6’1). This winter I am planning to wear a turtle neck under it.  All it needs now is the right necklace. I bought 3 of these in different colors. I am happy with this purchase.
I ordered the size Amazon recommended, but it was huge on me.  I had to return.

评论概述: Khaki sweatshirt good for year around fits I love it
评论详情: I’ll wear it and keep it because it fits  what more can I ask for I do like it very much
I love the quality of this shirt. It fits perfectly!!!
Too big, not flattering. The whole thing is a BIG mistake.

评论概述: A very comfortable yet attractive top
评论详情: Has become a favorite.  I can wear it this summer because air conditioning can get cool at work.
Absolutely garbage. Item received looks nothing like the picture. It has no shape, is boxy and shapeless. Fabric is thin and cheap. The model post is deceiving. Just didn’t meet the mark.

评论概述: Love the feel of this fabric!
评论详情: One of the most comfortable shirts I have ever worn!  Nice enough to wear to work and comfy enough to lounge in.  The size runs a little big (bought a 3X, but really needed a 2X) and the fabric also washes and dries beautifully!

I loved this piece.  Perfect to lounge around the house and the occasional quick errand.  Fits true to size being plus size it's very hard to order clothing online sometimes due to various sizing.  Looking forward to purchasing more of these for fall/winter time.
It fits well and looks good on me. Washes great, but I laid it flat to dry.

Super comfy and soft. This has turned into my new favorite go to sweatshirt. Non binding around neck or cuffs. It said my ideal size would be a 4x but I’m swimming in it. I could have done a 2 or 3x with plenty of room to spare but I’m super happy.
Live the feel and color. It is a little thicker and heavier so take that into consideration.

评论概述: Not as pictured in style or color
评论详情: I ordered the green. In the picture, it looks like a rich pine green, but I received more of an olive green. It's really just a long sleeve T-shirt... Not the knit weave it appears to be in the photo.
This is cut very long and large. Adjusted sized maybe 1-2 sizes smaller
So far I love this shirt. It's not the normal weight of a hoodie but more like a thick thermal. The pockets are great and the sizing seems to be pretty accurate.

I will keep this shirt only because it is a knit see through light weight shirt and spring is on the way.  However, I was dupped.  Discription said it was a light weight sweat shirt.  There is no way this is any kind of sweat shirt.  It is a knit tunic.
I’m 5’8 and this comes down mid thigh. It’s soft and comfortable and cozy.
I half expected a heavy a material. It's perfect! It fits beautifully. Very well made. In fact, I'm buying 2 more!  It's sort of a lightweight sweatshirt, the cut is wonderful too!
Runs incredibly big
Opened package and didn't like quality of fabric, returned immediately.  Looked like a tshirt material.

This top is everything! I was a little apprehensive about ordering it, but I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. It fit great! I can dress it up, or wear it very casually. It's so soft! I'm waiting on my second one now.
It’s such a great shirt! I love this shirt, fits wonderfully, so soft, love the sizing, love the sleeves and of course the pockets!!!
I thought the sweater was nice and of goood quality, I just purchased the wrong size. I wanted it to look oversize, but it was way too big and looked boxy on me.
A lite weight top. Not a heavy sweater.
Nice tunic. Expect it to be very long. I'm tall so I like it!
Good length nice placement on the pockets kinda lounge wear, soft material, a little big I should have ordered smaller size. But love the shirt.
This is a super comfortable top. It does run big, which makes it able to be worn over sized for plus size people.

I love these sweaters so much I bought six of them in different colors! They're soft, the colors are vibrant and very flattering to wear. My only complaint is the sleeves are seriously long so you have to fold them up. Major plus is the two pockets in the front!

评论概述: Not really a sweatshirt but super comfortable
评论详情: This shirt is advertised as a sweatshirt, but it's not really a sweatshirt, more of a super soft sweater. It's super comfortable, and I love the pockets! I liked it so much I bought two more in different colors! Highly recommend.
I love the tshirt.
Great quality but runs very long and I could have bought a smaller size.
I love the fit and softness and color of this tunic. But I’ve washed it twice now on delicate and let air dry and it’s already so pilled I won’t wear it outside the house.

评论概述: A plus sized sweatshirt! It’s cute AND covers my rear!!
评论详情: I love the cut and feel of this sweatshirt AND it covers my bodacious rear! It’s really soft and my go to for winter. I wish there was a touch of spandex in it, so it would keep its shape. For the price I probably won’t get more than a season out of it, but it’s worth it. Will endeavor to add to my collection with some other colors (the pink is super cute too!)
great for cleaning the house in a comfortable and movable top or even for just lounging around on a Saturday watching movies.
Well made, great value for the quality. The black, olive green, and burnt orange are my favorite.

评论概述: Loved the first one - had to order another
评论详情: Loved the first one so I ordered another in a different color - only thing is they run big so the second one I went down one size.
Not nice looking at all.
Returned, it was very long.

评论概述: Nice Quality, But Brighter Than Expected
评论详情: Shirt is really nice thick soft jersey material. I ordered my usual size (4X) and it fits fine. You’ll want to order one size up if you plan to layer or achieve the baggy fit pictured.  Really love the slouchy shoulders.  The color isn’t quite the muted “quiet luxe” shade of pink pictured. The color is brighter than I was expecting, but it’s still a pretty shirt.  Definitely keeping and may even order another one.
My mother in law loves it. It can be worn with anything. Dress or jeans
Good quality, thick fabric. Fits loosely, does stick to your body. Color is pretty peach not pink.
Size down, material is heavy but thin if that makes any sense. Do not go with normal size! I wear a 2xl and that’s what I bought and it’s huge!

评论概述: The fabric feels thin and cheep
评论详情: I was excited at first because I wanted a top in this color. When the sweater arrived it was a wrinkled mess. The cloth is thin and clingy. I will not purchase this brand again.
Flattering comfy fit. Perfect for colder temps. Washed with no shrinkage. The pockets are a plus.
Expect this top to be oversized! I love this soft fabric and color- blue. Feels so good against your skin. I would recommend this to my friends.
I sized up because I wanted it oversized but I really didn't need to, it's quite long. I took off 1 star because the seam at the upper arm and sometimes get a little annoying if it bunches up.
I liked the side pockets  they  are not bulky
This is a nice, non see through sweater that runs a little big! Very comfortable! I love it!
Love the quality
Good quality middle weight sweater.

评论概述: Fabric is not what I expected
评论详情: The fit is good enough, but isn't as roomy as it looks in the picture.  Also, the fabric is thinner than I expected.  It's more like a long-sleeved nylon t-shirt.  Not should I would order another one.
This is a nice shirt, if not a bit on the thin side.
Pockets!! Yay!! Received one, loved and bought two more colors. Mid weight sweater knit material, well made, hangs nicely.
This is just what I was looking for over sized and coveres my tush!

I sized up to ensure a loose and comfy fit.  I like it. The length is good for jeans and/or leggings. I washed in cold and laid flat to dry…no issues with shrinking or fading. The pockets are nice, though they’re placement is more forward than most tops with pockets. Perfect for fall and winter. 👍🏻

Im often disappointed buying clothing online as im very picky about the material. I love this and the material. I bought black and 2x. I like my casual shirts loose. I think it runs accurate size. Well made. Great soft material.
Soft and cosy, this go anywhere top is now a staple in my wardrobe. I bought a second to put away.

I bought the black tunic with front pockets. I was Leary when I got it but I LOVE it. I did go up one size just to be safe as some Amazon clothes run small. I can’t speak for the other styles but the black tunic with front pockets is lovely, cozy and a quick, cute go-to for days I can’t find what to wear. I only wish the company offered more color options in that style.:)
I love the material it was soft and hung nicely. The fit was perfect not to tight not to lose. It's great to be casual or slightly dressed. I get asked by several where they can get one just like it.

Another sweater my sister ordered and from what she had to say is that it’s very comfortable and warm. She ordered a 3x and it fit as expected. She loves oversized sweaters so she's happy with it. The best part she said it has pockets. Makes a great gift. Made out great quality material.
Comfortable, oversized sweater that is made really nice. Size of a spot on and I love that it has pockets.
This is super cute.  Comfortable and yes I am ordering all the colors.

This is large and loose sweater so very comfortable to wear, but the material is thin. It’s more like a thick t-shirt than a sweater, but it is sufficiently warm for chilly mornings while I work from home. With the temps in the mid to high 60s indoors, it’s warm enough not to have to wear extra layers or turn the heater on.  The black also stays a very rich, deep black even after washing multiple times. The two front pockets are large but not quite tall enough for my phone. I have a 13 Pro Max, and the weight of the phone makes it sag in the pocket so not fit very securely, but the pockets are large enough to fit my hands and small items.
I maybe should have ordered a size down but I wanted it to wear with leggings and it is perfect. The material is wonderful, super comfortable!!! Buy it ladies

This is quite a nice sweatshirt like top.  It has a nice weight, stretchiness and softness, and hangs very well - no bulges showing off.  It has just the right amount if warmth.  The shoulder style is a bit unusual. But the stretchiness of the fabric allows unimpeded movement.  My only complaint is the sleeves - WAY too long, and I mean long.  This is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.I will either just roll up the sleeves or shorten them.  But overall I am quite happy with this top.
This is a very soft, comfortable loose-fitting pullover-styled shirt. It is a regular for fall weekend days for my wife.

It was a little bigger than I was expecting but it's super comfortable and soft and I absolutely love the pockets.  I got the light blue one and I  love the color. Is really nice to wear on a cool fall day.
This top is a nice big comfy sweatershirt type like material. I love that there.are nice big pockets in the front. I like this much more than I expected.

Incredibly comfy sweater! It's finally cooling down into my favorite season and it felt great being able to wear this over the past few days while working from home. No itchy neck tag, just the right weight. It feels like heavier t-shirt. No problems machine washing, hanging to dry. The big pockets fit my phone without issues. Color was exactly as shown too. Super happy!

I’m 5’6’ and have a longer torso. Most long shirts only cover my behind mid-way but this one is long enough to completely cover like a short dress. I washed and dried it before trying it on and it didn’t shrink. The fabric is soft and feels like a typical long t-shirt fabric, not too thin but not thick like a college sweat shirt. Personally, I wished it was a bit thicker. It's not see-through but whatever you have underneath like your bra or belt might show up.  The color is a bit more beige than in the picture. I was hoping to have that little pinky apricot color like in the product page. The actual color is similar to my greenish skin color, it’s not a complimenting color for me. If I got it in other colors like black, I would’ve worn it when I go out.  Overall, it’s a cute comfy oversized shirt with awesome big pockets.
I haven't wore it out yet but omg it's so comfy. It's oversized and I could just snuggle into it.

评论概述: It is comfortable and has POCKETS!
评论详情: I feel a little frumpy in this shirt, but I would describe my shape as a vertical rectangle so I honestly feel frumpy in 86% of the clothes I wear. Otherwise, it fit as expected,  was oversized and cozy and you just want to stay in it forever at home.

Great shirt/tunic! I am a 3x in places like Torrid and I sized to a 4x for this because I wanted it to be oversized and I'm glad I did. The material is somewhere between a t-shirt and sweatshirt. It drapes well. I like that the black is a blank canvas that I can accessorize for work (push the sleeves up with a good necklace) or cozy fall afternoon (leggings and a chunky scarf). It's even comfortable enough to wear for jammies. Solid find.

This sweatshirt is a nice quality material, super soft. It is the perfect weight, not to hot and thick, just warm enough. It fits true to size to a little oversized. I like my sweatshirts like that. Love the length to wear with leggings and cover my booty. The pockets are amazing. Love this gray color, will go with everything.
